title: Roy Hargrove - 1994 - With the Tenors of Our Time FLAC
description:
Roy Hargrove - 1994 - With the Tenors of Our Time

Trumpeter Roy Hargrove has the opportunity of a lifetime on this recording, sharing separate songs with five great tenors: Johnny Griffin, Joe Henderson, Branford Marsalis, Joshua Redman, and Stanley Turrentine. Everyone fares well, including Hargrove's group (Ron Blake on tenor and soprano, pianist Cyrus Chestnut, bassist Rodney Whitaker, and drummer Gregory Hutchinson). The young trumpeter (who is vying for Lee Morgan's unoccupied chair) keeps up with the saxophonists on this generally relaxed affair; recommended for hard bop fans. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01 - Soppin' The Biscuit (feat. Stanley Turrentine)
02 - When We Were One (feat. Johnny Griffin)
03 - Valse Hot (feat. Branford Marsalis)
04 - Once Forgotten
05 - Shade Of Jade (feat. Joe Henderson)
06 - Greens At The Chicken Shack (feat. Johnny Griffin)
07 - Never Let Me Go
08 - Serenity (feat. Joe Henderson)
09 - Across The Pond (feat. Joshua Redman)
10 - Wild Is Love (feat. Stanley Turrentine)
11 - Mental Phrasing (feat. Joshua Redman)
12 - April's Fool
